passive.name: One At A Time
passive.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and increases DMG dealt by follow-up attack by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, inflicts the target with the Tame state, stacking up to {{4}} time(s). When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, each Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
